segments.text: Would you please recommend a diamond for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . How about this diamond necklace ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I prefer a diamond mounted in a ring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then . I'm sure you will like this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . This is the warranty . The cut , color , clarity , weight and the manufacturer of the diamond are all indicated in this document .
segments.speaker: S2
